con:testCase.name: FF06-MixCategoryPurpose
con:testCase.con:description: TC will create Error Codes for FF06-MixCategoryPurpose

con:config.con:query: select distinct(CUSTOMERID),ACCOUNTNUMBER from V_authorisation where CUSTBANKID='${Properties#bankId}' and length(customerID)='11' and BLOCKED = 'N' and BLOCKEDFORDEBIT='N' fetch first 2 rows only

con:property.con:name: receiveMessagePain002
con:property.con:value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.002.001.04"> <CstmrPmtStsRpt> <GrpHdr> <MsgId>03125601129.49435.917619</MsgId> <CreDtTm>2021-06-14T09:47:38.685+02:00</CreDtTm> <InitgPty> <Nm>Mentor Medier AS</Nm> <Id> <OrgId> <AnyBIC>SPTRNO22XXX</AnyBIC> <Othr> <Id>122032456</Id> <SchmeNm> <Cd>BANK</Cd> </SchmeNm> </Othr> <Othr> <Id>921095899</Id> <SchmeNm> <Cd>USAG</Cd> </SchmeNm> </Othr> </OrgId> </Id> </InitgPty> </GrpHdr> <OrgnlGrpInfAndSts> <OrgnlMsgId>Err_14621011642</OrgnlMsgId> <OrgnlMsgNmId>pain.001.001.04</OrgnlMsgNmId> </OrgnlGrpInfAndSts> <OrgnlPmtInfAndSts> <OrgnlPmtInfId>Err_14621011642</OrgnlPmtInfId> <StsRsnInf> <Rsn> <Cd>FF06</Cd> </Rsn> <AddtlInf>It is not allowed to mix different types of category purpose groups within the same payment info.</AddtlInf> </StsRsnInf> <TxInfAndSts> <OrgnlInstrId>Err_14621011642</OrgnlInstrId> <OrgnlEndToEndId>Err_14621011642</OrgnlEndToEndId> <TxSts>RJCT</TxSts> <StsRsnInf> <AddtlInf>260761405</AddtlInf> </StsRsnInf> </TxInfAndSts> <TxInfAndSts> <OrgnlInstrId>Step30_inst</OrgnlInstrId> <OrgnlEndToEndId>Err_146210116421</OrgnlEndToEndId> <TxSts>RJCT</TxSts> <StsRsnInf> <AddtlInf>260761406</AddtlInf> </StsRsnInf> </TxInfAndSts> </OrgnlPmtInfAndSts> </CstmrPmtStsRpt> </Document>

con:property.con:name: expectedStatusReason
con:property.con:value: It is not allowed to mix different types of category purpose groups within the same payment info.

con:property.con:name: actualStatusReason
con:property.con:value: It is not allowed to mix different types of category purpose groups within the same payment info.

con:config.con:query: select A.MESSAGEID,C.TRANSACTIONSID,B.PAYMENTINFOID ,C.PAYMENTSTATUS,C.PAYMENTTYPE,C.ENDTOENDID from MESSAGE A,PAYMENTINFO B, TRANSACTIONS C where A.MESSAGEID = B.FK_MESSAGEID and B.PAYMENTINFOID = C.FK_PAYMENTINFOID and A.MESSAGEIDENTIFICATION LIKE '%${Properties#MsgID}%'

select * from statusreason S, STATUSREASON_ADDT_INF SI where S.STATUSREASONID = SI.FK_STATUSREASONID and (S.FK_TRANSACTIONID = '${TRANSACTIONS#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}' OR S.FK_Paymentinfoid = '${TRANSACTIONS#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/PAYMENTINFOID[1]}' or s.FK_messageid = '${TRANSACTIONS#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/MESSAGEID[1]}') order by CODE asc

con:configuration.content: It is not allowed to mix different types of category purpose groups within the same payment info.
